classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building applications leveraging 'generative AI' for educational products like chatbots and content generation. It also mentions frameworks like LangChain/LangGraph and the development of user-facing systems, aligning directly with the core responsibilities and project examples of a GenAI Engineer.
